comics.title: Z Axis - Chapter 0
comics.description: Chapter 0 of Z Axis manga series
comics.fullDescription: The beginning of the Z Axis saga. This introductory chapter sets up the world, characters, and the adventure that awaits. Follow the story through 18 pages of sequential art.
